name: MDLLightProbeIrradianceDataSource
desc: Adopt this protocol to provide information for use in automatic placement of light probes around a scene.

items.name: var boundingBox: MDLAxisAlignedBoundingBox
items.desc: The bounding region of the scene to which light probes are being added.

items.name: var sphericalHarmonicsLevel: Int
items.desc: The number of levels of spherical harmonics information provided by the data source.

items.name: func sphericalHarmonicsCoefficients(atPosition: vector_float3) -> Data
items.desc: Asks the data source to provide spherical harmonics coefficients that describe lighting conditions in all directions from the specified point in a scene.
